page.title: 04EVER READY
page.content: This is the largest employer in the area.They make batteries.It was opened in 1967.There are 550 people employed and 120 people have recently been made redundant.There are 3 shifts 6:2,2:10,10:6 but not all work 10:6. Holidays are 5 weeks.My dad chose EVER READY because it was the only one with vacancies.He likes working there and drives a fork lift truck.The average wage is Â£150_Â£160 gross.The average wage for an unskilled worker is Â£130_Â£140 gross.The hourly wage for skilled men is Â£4.05 and for unskilled men Â£3.65.Some men get a bonus of Â£11.
